jp: So close so far
きっと 目を 閉じたんだろう
Rainbows or stars
ずっと見つけれなくて
街を今 傘もささずに 宛てもなくて
そして 凍えそうな雨に また泣きそうな夢を
ただ 失くさないように 片寄せあった二人
Tonight may be, we'll see the stars in the rain…
Tonight may be, we'll see the stars in the rain…
So close so far
Miles away, right past what I know
Rainbows of stars
How could I ever be afraid…
Out of my window
I found a reason to breathe
Beyond the bright lights
It shows
When it's all over I see
I just want to hold onto this dream
We're going in circles again
I wouldn't trade it for anything
Tonight maybe, we'll see the stars in the rain…
Tonight maybe, we'll see the stars in the rain…

きっと <ruby><rb>目</rb><rt>め</rt></ruby>を <ruby><rb>閉</rb><rt>と</rt></ruby>じたんだろう
Rainbows or stars
ずっと<ruby><rb>見</rb><rt>み</rt></ruby>つけれなくて
<ruby><rb>街</rb><rt>まち</rt></ruby>を<ruby><rb>今</rb><rt>いま</rt></ruby> <ruby><rb>傘</rb><rt>かさ</rt></ruby>もささずに <ruby><rb>宛</rb><rt>あ</rt></ruby>てもなくて
そして <ruby><rb>凍</rb><rt>こご</rt></ruby>えそうな<ruby><rb>雨</rb><rt>あめ</rt></ruby>に また<ruby><rb>泣</rb><rt>な</rt></ruby>きそうな<ruby><rb>夢</rb><rt>ゆめ</rt></ruby>を
ただ <ruby><rb>失</rb><rt>な</rt></ruby>くさないように <ruby><rb>片寄</rb><rt>かたよ</rt></ruby>せあった<ruby><rb>二人</rb><rt>ふたり</rt></ruby>
Tonight may be, we'll see the stars in the rain…
Tonight may be, we'll see the stars in the rain…
So close so far
Miles away, right past what I know
Rainbows of stars
How could I ever be afraid…
Out of my window
I found a reason to breathe
Beyond the bright lights
It shows
When it's all over I see
I just want to hold onto this dream
We're going in circles again
I wouldn't trade it for anything
Tonight maybe, we'll see the stars in the rain…
Tonight maybe, we'll see the stars in the rain…
zh_tw: 若近若遠
一定一直緊閉著雙眼吧
彩虹或是星光
一直尋找著它們的蹤影卻至今未果
此刻沒有打傘的我佇立在街頭 不知道自己該何去何從
陣陣冰雨就快將我凍結在原地 夢想它再一次泫然欲泣
為了從此再也不會丟失 我們並肩依偎著彼此
今夜或許我們會在雨裡看見璀璨的星光…
今夜或許我們會在雨裡看見璀璨的星光…
若近若遠
我憶起的往昔匆匆而逝
彩虹的星光
我怎麼會害怕過呢…
我的窗外
我發現得以呼吸的原因
明亮的燈光
似乎是
一切都結束了 我明白了
我只想緊握這夢境
我們再次陷入那漩渦中
我不會用以換取什麼
今夜或許我們會在雨裡看見璀璨的星光…
今夜或許我們會在雨裡看見璀璨的星光…
